content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The first manned Terran space expedition makes contact with a humanoid culture on Alpha Centauri.

gsx$event.$t: The first manned Terran space expedition makes contact with a humanoid culture on Alpha Centauri.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Alpha Centauri scientist Zephram Cochrane formulates the initial warp drive calculations that make fasterthanlight travel possible and, eventually, practical.

gsx$event.$t: Alpha Centauri scientist Zephram Cochrane formulates the initial warp drive calculations that make fasterthanlight travel possible and, eventually, practical.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: UNSS Bonaventure, the first experimental warp-drive ship, is commissioned.

gsx$event.$t: UNSS Bonaventure, the first experimental warp-drive ship, is commissioned.

content.$t: stardateend: 0/6509.00, full: TRUE, event: UNSS Bonaventure discovers Axanar. Led by Ensign Colin Fortine, a contact party meets with its inhabitants.

gsx$event.$t: UNSS Bonaventure discovers Axanar. Led by Ensign Colin Fortine, a contact party meets with its inhabitants.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Articles of Federation are signed at the First Babel Conference, establishing the United Federation of Planets. Shortly thereafter, General Order Number One is adopted as the most important regulation in the newly-established Starfleet Command.

gsx$event.$t: Articles of Federation are signed at the First Babel Conference, establishing the United Federation of Planets. Shortly thereafter, General Order Number One is adopted as the most important regulation in the newly-established Starfleet Command.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Command, with the permission of the Alpha Centauri Concordium of Planets, establishes the Centauri Test Range, a weaponry and propulsion test facility and research center

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Command, with the permission of the Alpha Centauri Concordium of Planets, establishes the Centauri Test Range, a weaponry and propulsion test facility and research center

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Federation cargo vessel Atlas is listed as missing after failing to arrive when scheduled. Later discoveries indicate the ship was destroyed by Romulan warships.

gsx$event.$t: Federation cargo vessel Atlas is listed as missing after failing to arrive when scheduled. Later discoveries indicate the ship was destroyed by Romulan warships.

content.$t: stardateend: 1/0909.00, full: TRUE, event: The war between the United Federation of Planets and the Romulan Star Empire takes place.

gsx$event.$t: The war between the United Federation of Planets and the Romulan Star Empire takes place.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's initial network of manned and automated border outposts becomes operational along the Romulan Neutral Zone.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's initial network of manned and automated border outposts becomes operational along the Romulan Neutral Zone.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The USS Yardley travels to Axanar and suffers several casualties among its contact party. As a result of the Captain's report, the planet is interdicted under the Non-Interference Directive.

gsx$event.$t: The USS Yardley travels to Axanar and suffers several casualties among its contact party. As a result of the Captain's report, the planet is interdicted under the Non-Interference Directive.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Federation Council refuses a funding request from Starfleet for the development of new starships. All funds previously assigned to completing construction of Star Base 12 are also "indefinitely postponed", to Starfleet's enormous surprise. Because construction had already begun, the installation retained its name, but remained uncompleted and inoperative until after the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: The Federation Council refuses a funding request from Starfleet for the development of new starships. All funds previously assigned to completing construction of Star Base 12 are also "indefinitely postponed", to Starfleet's enormous surprise. Because construction had already begun, the installation retained its name, but remained uncompleted and inoperative until after the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The interplanetary war of Beta Cersus within the Romulan Neutral Zone does not involve Federation ships, but causes the Federation Council to reverse its position on new starship construction. The ruling on Star Base 12, however, is not altered. Construction of other Star Bases in more strategically crucial locations is authorized instead.

gsx$event.$t: The interplanetary war of Beta Cersus within the Romulan Neutral Zone does not involve Federation ships, but causes the Federation Council to reverse its position on new starship construction. The ruling on Star Base 12, however, is not altered. Construction of other Star Bases in more strategically crucial locations is authorized instead.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The expensive and ill-fated USS Tritium Class cruiser enters service, never meeting any design specifications. Numerous high-level Starfleet personnel are discharged as a result, and all six Tritium Class ships are decommissioned within seven years.

gsx$event.$t: The expensive and ill-fated USS Tritium Class cruiser enters service, never meeting any design specifications. Numerous high-level Starfleet personnel are discharged as a result, and all six Tritium Class ships are decommissioned within seven years.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: First contact with the Klingon Empire occurs when the USS Sentry confronts the Klingon cruiser Devisor near Gamma Demetrius.

gsx$event.$t: First contact with the Klingon Empire occurs when the USS Sentry confronts the Klingon cruiser Devisor near Gamma Demetrius.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Arcturus Test Range begins operations, serving as Starfleet's newest propulsion and weaponry test facility.

gsx$event.$t: The Arcturus Test Range begins operations, serving as Starfleet's newest propulsion and weaponry test facility.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Terra-Return League is formed on Benecia Colony. Their goal is to dissolve the Federation and have all Humans return to the Sol system.

gsx$event.$t: The Terra-Return League is formed on Benecia Colony. Their goal is to dissolve the Federation and have all Humans return to the Sol system.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The USS Flying Fortress, carrying a prototype deflector shield, is crippled and spacejacked by a Klingon pirate vessel, which then tows it toward Klingon space. A Federation task force intercepts the Klingon ship, aborting their action.

gsx$event.$t: The USS Flying Fortress, carrying a prototype deflector shield, is crippled and spacejacked by a Klingon pirate vessel, which then tows it toward Klingon space. A Federation task force intercepts the Klingon ship, aborting their action.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Star Base 22, constructed near the Klingon border, assumes operational status.

gsx$event.$t: Star Base 22, constructed near the Klingon border, assumes operational status.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Star Base 23, also constructed near the Klingon border, assumes operational status.

gsx$event.$t: Star Base 23, also constructed near the Klingon border, assumes operational status.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's USS Baton Rouge Class cruiser becomes operational. It is capable of Warp .8, the fastest speed possible in any starship not equipped with dilithium. A total of 220 were built before the class ceased production.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's USS Baton Rouge Class cruiser becomes operational. It is capable of Warp .8, the fastest speed possible in any starship not equipped with dilithium. A total of 220 were built before the class ceased production.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Th'allt, an Andorian colony world, appeals to the Federation Council for economic protection from Tellarite merchants. The Bureau of Interstellar Commerce fails to take timely and effective action to resolve the situation.

gsx$event.$t: Th'allt, an Andorian colony world, appeals to the Federation Council for economic protection from Tellarite merchants. The Bureau of Interstellar Commerce fails to take timely and effective action to resolve the situation.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Andorian Admiral Hathari conducts "fleet maneuvers" near Thallt as part of Operation Archimedes, firing on Tellar-registered trading ships. This reveals the Scandal of Archimedes, which emphasizes the unwieldy bureaucracy of the Federation and adds to the popularity of the Terra-Return League.

gsx$event.$t: Andorian Admiral Hathari conducts "fleet maneuvers" near Thallt as part of Operation Archimedes, firing on Tellar-registered trading ships. This reveals the Scandal of Archimedes, which emphasizes the unwieldy bureaucracy of the Federation and adds to the popularity of the Terra-Return League.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Richard Daystrom's revolutionary theory on computer information processing, combined with William E. Abramson's transtator physics, results in the design of the first practical, portable universal translator.

gsx$event.$t: Richard Daystrom's revolutionary theory on computer information processing, combined with William E. Abramson's transtator physics, results in the design of the first practical, portable universal translator.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The materializer (later called the transporter) is invented.

gsx$event.$t: The materializer (later called the transporter) is invented.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Extensive dilithium deposits are discovered at the Rigel XII Mining Complex. They are mined and sold by the Orion Colonies to the UFP and Klingon Empire alike, for use as power rectifiers in starship warp drives. Dilithium revolutionizes interstellar travel and military weapon technology.

gsx$event.$t: Extensive dilithium deposits are discovered at the Rigel XII Mining Complex. They are mined and sold by the Orion Colonies to the UFP and Klingon Empire alike, for use as power rectifiers in starship warp drives. Dilithium revolutionizes interstellar travel and military weapon technology.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Second Babel Conference meets to address a number of questions, including the volatile issues raised by the TerraReturn League. After lengthy speeches, a vote to dissolve the United Federation of Planets fails, and so the Federation remains intact. Immediately after the Conference, the TerraReturn League is disbanded, ending any further political influence by the organization.

gsx$event.$t: The Second Babel Conference meets to address a number of questions, including the volatile issues raised by the TerraReturn League. After lengthy speeches, a vote to dissolve the United Federation of Planets fails, and so the Federation remains intact. Immediately after the Conference, the TerraReturn League is disbanded, ending any further political influence by the organization.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Hale Class scout becomes operational, but is not equipped with the newer, more powerful, dilithium-moderated warp drive. With the commissioning of this class, Starfleet begins an extensive construction program oriented toward building ships designed to investigate unexplored space. An unusually small ship, the Hale is cheap to produce. A total of 130 were manufactured.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Hale Class scout becomes operational, but is not equipped with the newer, more powerful, dilithium-moderated warp drive. With the commissioning of this class, Starfleet begins an extensive construction program oriented toward building ships designed to investigate unexplored space. An unusually small ship, the Hale is cheap to produce. A total of 130 were manufactured.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Bode Class scout becomes operational, the last major warship to lack dilithium-moderated warp drive. A total of 51 are built.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Bode Class scout becomes operational, the last major warship to lack dilithium-moderated warp drive. A total of 51 are built.

content.$t: stardateend: 1/8703.00, full: TRUE, event: Klingon activities near the Federation border decrease drastically during this period, with few Klingon warships seen and the number of routine confrontations dropping by more than 70 percent. Starfleet Intelligence learns from Operation Dixie that the Klingons are fighting a war with an unknown race along their coreward border.

gsx$event.$t: Klingon activities near the Federation border decrease drastically during this period, with few Klingon warships seen and the number of routine confrontations dropping by more than 70 percent. Starfleet Intelligence learns from Operation Dixie that the Klingons are fighting a war with an unknown race along their coreward border.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Construction begins at Starfleet's San Francisco Naval Shipyard on USS Constitution.

gsx$event.$t: Construction begins at Starfleet's San Francisco Naval Shipyard on USS Constitution.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet begins a large-scale construction program aimed at greatly expanding the fleet.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet begins a large-scale construction program aimed at greatly expanding the fleet.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon D-4A cruiser entered service at this time. Early mass production of this ship provided circumstantial evidence that the Klingon Empire was fighting another war.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon D-4A cruiser entered service at this time. Early mass production of this ship provided circumstantial evidence that the Klingon Empire was fighting another war.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Marklin Class destroyer becomes operational. The ship's performance does not meet with high expectations, and so only 20 are built.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Marklin Class destroyer becomes operational. The ship's performance does not meet with high expectations, and so only 20 are built.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Ptolemy Class transport enters service, but limited appropriations permit the construction of only 15.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Ptolemy Class transport enters service, but limited appropriations permit the construction of only 15.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Hermes Class scout becomes operational, but Starfleet's increasing emphasis on larger survey vessels, combined with manufacturing delays, results in curtailed production. A total of 15 are built.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Hermes Class scout becomes operational, but Starfleet's increasing emphasis on larger survey vessels, combined with manufacturing delays, results in curtailed production. A total of 15 are built.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Sawyer Class scout becomes operational, with wide use in non-combat areas of the Federation. A total of 69 are constructed.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Sawyer Class scout becomes operational, with wide use in non-combat areas of the Federation. A total of 69 are constructed.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Klingon D-7A cruiser enters service at this time. Though the D-7C Class does not enter production soon enough to see combat during the Four Years War, the D-7 Class, with its variants, becomes the mainstay of the Klingon fleet for nearly four decades.

gsx$event.$t: The Klingon D-7A cruiser enters service at this time. Though the D-7C Class does not enter production soon enough to see combat during the Four Years War, the D-7 Class, with its variants, becomes the mainstay of the Klingon fleet for nearly four decades.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Siva Class destroyer enters service, but enormous design flaws result in a sharply-reduced production schedule. Only 10 are constructed.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Siva Class destroyer enters service, but enormous design flaws result in a sharply-reduced production schedule. Only 10 are constructed.

content.$t: stardateend: 1/9308.00, full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Baton Rouge Class cruisers are reequipped with dilithium-moderated warp engines. This timely improvement allows the ship to continue to serve effectively as a light cruiser throughout the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Baton Rouge Class cruisers are reequipped with dilithium-moderated warp engines. This timely improvement allows the ship to continue to serve effectively as a light cruiser throughout the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Great Awakening begins.

gsx$event.$t: The Great Awakening begins.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Anton Class research cruiser becomes operational, with over 120 built. As The Great Awakening continues, this vessel serves in the forefront of the UFP's boundary expansion efforts.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Anton Class research cruiser becomes operational, with over 120 built. As The Great Awakening continues, this vessel serves in the forefront of the UFP's boundary expansion efforts.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Larson Class destroyer becomes operational. With nearly 200 built, the Larson serves as a major combatant vessel throughout the Four Years War. Peacetime production averaged 10 per year.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Larson Class destroyer becomes operational. With nearly 200 built, the Larson serves as a major combatant vessel throughout the Four Years War. Peacetime production averaged 10 per year.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Constitution Class cruiser becomes operational, and Starfleet allocates funds for 13 construction contracts.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Constitution Class cruiser becomes operational, and Starfleet allocates funds for 13 construction contracts.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Nelson Class scout becomes operational, and proves to possess an exceptional design. When production ceased, over 400 had been completed. Peacetime production of this class averaged 18 per year.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Nelson Class scout becomes operational, and proves to possess an exceptional design. When production ceased, over 400 had been completed. Peacetime production of this class averaged 18 per year.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Klingon D-16A destroyer enters service at this time, seeing action during the Four Years War as the Klingon Navy's primary destroyer class.

gsx$event.$t: The Klingon D-16A destroyer enters service at this time, seeing action during the Four Years War as the Klingon Navy's primary destroyer class.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Liberty Class Freighter is commissioned and put into service. This ship proves to be the cargo workhorse for the Federation during the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: The Liberty Class Freighter is commissioned and put into service. This ship proves to be the cargo workhorse for the Federation during the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Klingon K-17A scout enters service at this time, often used along the Federation border prior to the Four Years War. This ship, and the later -B variant, served as their primary scout vessel during the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: The Klingon K-17A scout enters service at this time, often used along the Federation border prior to the Four Years War. This ship, and the later -B variant, served as their primary scout vessel during the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Kepler Class transport becomes operational. A total of 15 are built.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Kepler Class transport becomes operational. A total of 15 are built.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Apache Class destroyer becomes operational, and 26 are built.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Apache Class destroyer becomes operational, and 26 are built.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns the Klingon Z-4B defense outpost has entered service at this time. The construction of a powerful, yet somewhat mobile, defensive installation signalled the beginning of a shipbuilding program in preparation for war against the Federation.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns the Klingon Z-4B defense outpost has entered service at this time. The construction of a powerful, yet somewhat mobile, defensive installation signalled the beginning of a shipbuilding program in preparation for war against the Federation.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Eagle Class starliner enters service in the Federation, with a total of 255 constructed. During the Four Years War, a number of these ships were temporarily converted into assault ships and freighters.

gsx$event.$t: The Eagle Class starliner enters service in the Federation, with a total of 255 constructed. During the Four Years War, a number of these ships were temporarily converted into assault ships and freighters.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Monoceros Class operational, with 16 built.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Monoceros Class operational, with 16 built.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon K-3A gunboat entered service at this time. This ship, and the later -E variant, served as system defense and convoy escort ships throughout the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon K-3A gunboat entered service at this time. This ship, and the later -E variant, served as system defense and convoy escort ships throughout the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon K-30A monitor entered service at this time. A generally unsuccessful design, this vessel (and the later -E variant) nevertheless saw considerable service during the Four Years War as a component of Klingon planetary defensive systems.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon K-30A monitor entered service at this time. A generally unsuccessful design, this vessel (and the later -E variant) nevertheless saw considerable service during the Four Years War as a component of Klingon planetary defensive systems.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon T-3A assault ship became operational at this time. It became the primary ground force transport used during the Four Years War

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon T-3A assault ship became operational at this time. It became the primary ground force transport used during the Four Years War

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Marine Academy is established.

gsx$event.$t: The Marine Academy is established.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Loknar Class frigate becomes operational, serving admirably throughout the Four Years War. A total of 218 are built.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Loknar Class frigate becomes operational, serving admirably throughout the Four Years War. A total of 218 are built.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Cochrane Class colonial transport becomes operational, with over 360 built. This lightly-armed vessel is used by Starfleet Colonial Operations Command for emergency evacuations during the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: The Cochrane Class colonial transport becomes operational, with over 360 built. This lightly-armed vessel is used by Starfleet Colonial Operations Command for emergency evacuations during the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Dollond and Doppler Class transports enter service, becoming a mainstay of Starfleet's Materiel Command during the Four Years War. A total of 110 are constructed.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Dollond and Doppler Class transports enter service, becoming a mainstay of Starfleet's Materiel Command during the Four Years War. A total of 110 are constructed.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Heston Class cruiser becomes operational, with 16 manufactured.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Heston Class cruiser becomes operational, with 16 manufactured.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: A study completed for the Federation Councils Office of Public Information reports that the new dilithiumpowered starships will eventually permit a thorough exploration of all sectors within the United Federation of Planets' sphere of influence. This finding supports Starfleet's recent emphasis placed on the Galaxy Exploration Command.

gsx$event.$t: A study completed for the Federation Councils Office of Public Information reports that the new dilithiumpowered starships will eventually permit a thorough exploration of all sectors within the United Federation of Planets' sphere of influence. This finding supports Starfleet's recent emphasis placed on the Galaxy Exploration Command.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Klingon D-4E variant, used in the Axanar task force as well as throughout the Four Years War, enters service at this time.

gsx$event.$t: The Klingon D-4E variant, used in the Axanar task force as well as throughout the Four Years War, enters service at this time.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Cygnus Class courier/command operations ship becomes operational, with nine built. These vessels served as battle fleet operations centers throughout the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Cygnus Class courier/command operations ship becomes operational, with nine built. These vessels served as battle fleet operations centers throughout the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon L-6B frigate entered service at this time. Though not seeing extensive action during the Four Years War, it was a powerful and effective warship, often successfully attacking and defeating two or three Federation destroyers and frigates at a time.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon L-6B frigate entered service at this time. Though not seeing extensive action during the Four Years War, it was a powerful and effective warship, often successfully attacking and defeating two or three Federation destroyers and frigates at a time.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Canopus Class research cruiser becomes operational, providing extensive scientific facilities in support of exploratory missions in the Federation's Sagittarian arm. A total of 22 are built.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Canopus Class research cruiser becomes operational, providing extensive scientific facilities in support of exploratory missions in the Federation's Sagittarian arm. A total of 22 are built.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the first Axanarian task force under command of Klingon Admiral Kkorhetza left the Klingon naval base of Ruwan.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the first Axanarian task force under command of Klingon Admiral Kkorhetza left the Klingon naval base of Ruwan.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon forces left a region of Klingon space known as "the Hook" to attack Arcanis.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon forces left a region of Klingon space known as "the Hook" to attack Arcanis.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that Klingon Group "R" under Admiral Kazu left the Klingon naval base at Veska.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that Klingon Group "R" under Admiral Kazu left the Klingon naval base at Veska.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that Klingon Group "U" under Admiral Kone left Klingon space near the base at H'rez.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that Klingon Group "U" under Admiral Kone left Klingon space near the base at H'rez.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The USS Bohr is diverted from picket duty, permitting a Klingon battle force to reach the Federation-manned Arcanis Four Research Outpost. The entire crew of this base is massacred by Klingon marines.

gsx$event.$t: The USS Bohr is diverted from picket duty, permitting a Klingon battle force to reach the Federation-manned Arcanis Four Research Outpost. The entire crew of this base is massacred by Klingon marines.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the first Axanarian task force entered Federation space at this time.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the first Axanarian task force entered Federation space at this time.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The USS Rutherford detects Group "R" unclaimed space between the two powers.

gsx$event.$t: The USS Rutherford detects Group "R" unclaimed space between the two powers.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The USS Irwin detects Group "U" in the unclaimed space between the two powers. Starfleet transfers all available warships from neighboring sectors to organize a defense.

gsx$event.$t: The USS Irwin detects Group "U" in the unclaimed space between the two powers. Starfleet transfers all available warships from neighboring sectors to organize a defense.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Both Klingon forces reduce speed and remain outside Federation-declared boundaries. This act confuses the Federation Council and they do not formally declare war.

gsx$event.$t: Both Klingon forces reduce speed and remain outside Federation-declared boundaries. This act confuses the Federation Council and they do not formally declare war.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns the first Axanarian task force arrived at Axanar at this time. They also discover that the second, reinforcing task force departed for Axanar at this time.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns the first Axanarian task force arrived at Axanar at this time. They also discover that the second, reinforcing task force departed for Axanar at this time.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The USS Gulliver, a Sawyer Class scout, is instructed to travel to Axanar. Its mission is to evaluate Axanar's sociological development.

gsx$event.$t: The USS Gulliver, a Sawyer Class scout, is instructed to travel to Axanar. Its mission is to evaluate Axanar's sociological development.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The log later recovered from the USS Gulliver's ship redorder buoy will indicate the Gulliver entered the Axanarian system at this time, being met and destroyed by the Klingon taskforce already there.

gsx$event.$t: The log later recovered from the USS Gulliver's ship redorder buoy will indicate the Gulliver entered the Axanarian system at this time, being met and destroyed by the Klingon taskforce already there.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The USS Xenophon, a Marklin Class destroyer, encounters a Klingon D-4E cruiser eight parsecs from Axanar, and disables it. The commander of the USS Xenophonis Captain Garth of Izar.

gsx$event.$t: The USS Xenophon, a Marklin Class destroyer, encounters a Klingon D-4E cruiser eight parsecs from Axanar, and disables it. The commander of the USS Xenophonis Captain Garth of Izar.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The USS Bonhomme Richard, on routine patrol, locates and retrieves the USS Gulliver's recorder buoy, which reveals the vessels fate. In light of the recent Arcanis massacre, the Federation Council demands that Klingon forces at Axanar withdraw to their border under Starfleet escort. The Klingon Admiral Kkorhetza at Axanar is permitted four months to receive instructions from his Empire. The USS Xenophon is already on its way to Axanar.

gsx$event.$t: The USS Bonhomme Richard, on routine patrol, locates and retrieves the USS Gulliver's recorder buoy, which reveals the vessels fate. In light of the recent Arcanis massacre, the Federation Council demands that Klingon forces at Axanar withdraw to their border under Starfleet escort. The Klingon Admiral Kkorhetza at Axanar is permitted four months to receive instructions from his Empire. The USS Xenophon is already on its way to Axanar.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Garth reaches Axanar several hours before the USS Bonhomme Richard, and so is given command of a Scout squadron assigned to monitor the Klingon taskforce.

gsx$event.$t: Garth reaches Axanar several hours before the USS Bonhomme Richard, and so is given command of a Scout squadron assigned to monitor the Klingon taskforce.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Portsmith Class destroyer becomes operational at a crucial time. Though not a powerful ship, it is constructed in large numbers, serving a multitude of escort and light combat assignments throughout the Four Years War. A total of 660 are built.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Portsmith Class destroyer becomes operational at a crucial time. Though not a powerful ship, it is constructed in large numbers, serving a multitude of escort and light combat assignments throughout the Four Years War. A total of 660 are built.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: One of the scouts near Axanar picks up the second, incoming Klingon task force. Garth, despite being outnumbered, quickly implements a tactical plan that results in his victory at the Battle of Axanar.

gsx$event.$t: One of the scouts near Axanar picks up the second, incoming Klingon task force. Garth, despite being outnumbered, quickly implements a tactical plan that results in his victory at the Battle of Axanar.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Siva Class is withdrawn from service.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Siva Class is withdrawn from service.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: In response to the Federation Council, Admiral Kkorhetza refuses to withdraw his ships from Federation territory, issuing a formal declaration of alliance with the natives in the Axanar system. This results in a state of war between the UFP and the Klingon Empire, and the Four Years War begins.

gsx$event.$t: In response to the Federation Council, Admiral Kkorhetza refuses to withdraw his ships from Federation territory, issuing a formal declaration of alliance with the natives in the Axanar system. This results in a state of war between the UFP and the Klingon Empire, and the Four Years War begins.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Captain Garth wins at the Second Battle of Axanar, and accepts the surrender of Admiral Kkorhetza.

gsx$event.$t: Captain Garth wins at the Second Battle of Axanar, and accepts the surrender of Admiral Kkorhetza.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns several strategic groups of Klingon cruisers left Klingon space and entered unclaimed space as they headed for UFP territory.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns several strategic groups of Klingon cruisers left Klingon space and entered unclaimed space as they headed for UFP territory.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Andromeda is fought. This battle proves there were small numbers of Klingon ships on the Federation border even before hostilities were officially declared.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Andromeda is fought. This battle proves there were small numbers of Klingon ships on the Federation border even before hostilities were officially declared.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The shipbuilding facilities at Star Base 15 are completed, and they quickly go into full production.

gsx$event.$t: The shipbuilding facilities at Star Base 15 are completed, and they quickly go into full production.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Genmarx and the Encounter at Lea are fought.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Genmarx and the Encounter at Lea are fought.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The convoy raid near Xamdab II takes place.

gsx$event.$t: The convoy raid near Xamdab II takes place.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Klingon G-8A cargo freighter enters service, replacing the obsolete G-4 transport. This ship will supply Klingon ground forces and forward installations throughout the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: The Klingon G-8A cargo freighter enters service, replacing the obsolete G-4 transport. This ship will supply Klingon ground forces and forward installations throughout the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Captain Robert April retires from Starfleet after quietly speaking out against certain Federation policies. He continues to serve as ambassador-at-large.

gsx$event.$t: Captain Robert April retires from Starfleet after quietly speaking out against certain Federation policies. He continues to serve as ambassador-at-large.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Hale Class scout is removed from service after performing unsatisfactorily in combat. Bode Class scouts are reequipped with more powerful warp engines to continue service as a stop-gap measure.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Hale Class scout is removed from service after performing unsatisfactorily in combat. Bode Class scouts are reequipped with more powerful warp engines to continue service as a stop-gap measure.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The frequency of piracy and ship disappearances begins to increase dramatically. Starfleet Intelligence initially suspects Orion privateers and small Klingon task groups of conducting the raids. Many years later, Starfleet Intelligence learns that the source of many attacks was actually Romulan ships, equipped with cloaking devices and self-destruct orders, carrying out covert raids during most of the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: The frequency of piracy and ship disappearances begins to increase dramatically. Starfleet Intelligence initially suspects Orion privateers and small Klingon task groups of conducting the raids. Many years later, Starfleet Intelligence learns that the source of many attacks was actually Romulan ships, equipped with cloaking devices and self-destruct orders, carrying out covert raids during most of the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: A Federation-operated, automated, zone-intrusion detection satellite briefly tracked the presence of a Romulan Graceful Flyer Class scout in the Romulan Neutral Zone. This observation greatly increased Starfleet Command's concern regarding the possibility of Romulan intervention in the Four Years War. To the Federation's pleasant surprise, the Romulan Star Empire never actively participated in open hostilities during the conflict.

gsx$event.$t: A Federation-operated, automated, zone-intrusion detection satellite briefly tracked the presence of a Romulan Graceful Flyer Class scout in the Romulan Neutral Zone. This observation greatly increased Starfleet Command's concern regarding the possibility of Romulan intervention in the Four Years War. To the Federation's pleasant surprise, the Romulan Star Empire never actively participated in open hostilities during the conflict.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Over the next several months, many Federation ships on Romulan Neutral Zone duty are gradually removed to fight against the Klingon fleets.

gsx$event.$t: Over the next several months, many Federation ships on Romulan Neutral Zone duty are gradually removed to fight against the Klingon fleets.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Lyclydun is fought. Janni IV is invaded by Klingon troops. The Laxala Incident takes place.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Lyclydun is fought. Janni IV is invaded by Klingon troops. The Laxala Incident takes place.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: As a result of the Laxala Incident, the Crion Colonies threaten to destroy all dilithium deposits if any further dilithium cargo convoys are attacked by either side.

gsx$event.$t: As a result of the Laxala Incident, the Crion Colonies threaten to destroy all dilithium deposits if any further dilithium cargo convoys are attacked by either side.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of GR-1 and the Assault of Nozseca VIII are fought. Both end in Federation defeat.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of GR-1 and the Assault of Nozseca VIII are fought. Both end in Federation defeat.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Attack of Convoy Y-16Z near Rebonet is fought. This is the first significant Federation fleet victory.

gsx$event.$t: The Attack of Convoy Y-16Z near Rebonet is fought. This is the first significant Federation fleet victory.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Achernar and Tikopai Class cruisers become operational. Very successful designs, 68 Achermar and 44 Tikopai will be built, each class seeing extensive combat. Unfortunately, almost all these ships are destroyed in weapons tests as a result of cost-cutting measures and Starfleet's postwar demilitarization.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Achernar and Tikopai Class cruisers become operational. Very successful designs, 68 Achermar and 44 Tikopai will be built, each class seeing extensive combat. Unfortunately, almost all these ships are destroyed in weapons tests as a result of cost-cutting measures and Starfleet's postwar demilitarization.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: As a result of numerous ship disappearances, Starfleet Command orders the Zone of Transport Escort for a large region of Federation space. This order restricts movement of private and commercial starships, requires naval escort for vessels travelling in the restricted area, and places armed marines aboard all escorted ships. These new regulations remain in effect until after the war. The Zone order significantly reduces the frequency of pirating attempts and unexplained starship disappearances.

gsx$event.$t: As a result of numerous ship disappearances, Starfleet Command orders the Zone of Transport Escort for a large region of Federation space. This order restricts movement of private and commercial starships, requires naval escort for vessels travelling in the restricted area, and places armed marines aboard all escorted ships. These new regulations remain in effect until after the war. The Zone order significantly reduces the frequency of pirating attempts and unexplained starship disappearances.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Nostveg I Engagement is fought, and the Klingons suffer a strategic defeat. The Landover tragedy takes place prior to the Battle of Joia V.

gsx$event.$t: The Nostveg I Engagement is fought, and the Klingons suffer a strategic defeat. The Landover tragedy takes place prior to the Battle of Joia V.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Sawyer Class Scout is withdrawn from service.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Sawyer Class Scout is withdrawn from service.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Sinbad IV is fought, marking the first major confrontation between ground troops of opposing forces. The Battle of Delgon-R is fought, marking the first use of gravitic mines and the first defensive action by the Klingons.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Sinbad IV is fought, marking the first major confrontation between ground troops of opposing forces. The Battle of Delgon-R is fought, marking the first use of gravitic mines and the first defensive action by the Klingons.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Sector 23-H between large forces of Klingon and Federation vessels results in a temporary Federation withdrawal. The Battle of Falgor occurs as part of the covering action. Starfleet's Bode Class scout is withdrawn from service.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Sector 23-H between large forces of Klingon and Federation vessels results in a temporary Federation withdrawal. The Battle of Falgor occurs as part of the covering action. Starfleet's Bode Class scout is withdrawn from service.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Lasur Funop and the Encounter at Videtu are fought. Though the reasons given are not satisfactory to many, the Constitution Class cruiser is withdrawn from front-line combat duty against Klingon forces. It will continue to serve on other fronts in its prewar capacities.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Lasur Funop and the Encounter at Videtu are fought. Though the reasons given are not satisfactory to many, the Constitution Class cruiser is withdrawn from front-line combat duty against Klingon forces. It will continue to serve on other fronts in its prewar capacities.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battles of Jevol, Klaf, and Ogolo are fought.

gsx$event.$t: The Battles of Jevol, Klaf, and Ogolo are fought.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Upon graduation, the first class of officers trained in the Marine Academy receive assignments with marine combat formations.

gsx$event.$t: Upon graduation, the first class of officers trained in the Marine Academy receive assignments with marine combat formations.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Klingon D-10A cruiser enters service and is immediately sent into combat. It becomes the most respected ship in the Klingon Imperial Navy. The Klingon D-20A cruiser also enters service at this time, filling a role similar to that of the D-7A Class. These new ships are a landmark in Klingon ship technology, both incorporating the first binary transformer deflector shields ever used on Klingon warships.

gsx$event.$t: The Klingon D-10A cruiser enters service and is immediately sent into combat. It becomes the most respected ship in the Klingon Imperial Navy. The Klingon D-20A cruiser also enters service at this time, filling a role similar to that of the D-7A Class. These new ships are a landmark in Klingon ship technology, both incorporating the first binary transformer deflector shields ever used on Klingon warships.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Debacle at Giso is fought. The Defense of Rudgur III takes place, marking the first use of chlortheragen, a Klingon-manufactured nerve gas.

gsx$event.$t: The Debacle at Giso is fought. The Defense of Rudgur III takes place, marking the first use of chlortheragen, a Klingon-manufactured nerve gas.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Talos IV is quarantined under General Order Number Seven. No explanation is given by Captain Christopher Pike.

gsx$event.$t: Talos IV is quarantined under General Order Number Seven. No explanation is given by Captain Christopher Pike.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Kesse takes place. A fast-moving Federation task force travelling within Klingon-held space catches a vital Klingon convoy by surprise. A number of escorts and freighters are destroyed, and a D-10 cruiser is severely damaged.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Kesse takes place. A fast-moving Federation task force travelling within Klingon-held space catches a vital Klingon convoy by surprise. A number of escorts and freighters are destroyed, and a D-10 cruiser is severely damaged.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Aakenn Class freighter is commissioned and put into service.

gsx$event.$t: The Aakenn Class freighter is commissioned and put into service.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Webirty is fought.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Webirty is fought.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Fenlon Class monitor becomes operational, with over 1200 manufactured. Ironically, this purely defensive sublight powered craft enters widespread service only after the Federation gains strategic control over invading Klingon forces.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Fenlon Class monitor becomes operational, with over 1200 manufactured. Ironically, this purely defensive sublight powered craft enters widespread service only after the Federation gains strategic control over invading Klingon forces.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Attack on Zal Vhros takes place. This engagement shows increasing Klingon frustration in fighting the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: The Attack on Zal Vhros takes place. This engagement shows increasing Klingon frustration in fighting the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns the Klingon K-23 escort entered service at this time. This vessel, of a non-Klingon configuration, was responsible for a period of extreme confusion among Intelligence operatives.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns the Klingon K-23 escort entered service at this time. This vessel, of a non-Klingon configuration, was responsible for a period of extreme confusion among Intelligence operatives.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The first phaser weapon systems are installed in frontline ships.

gsx$event.$t: The first phaser weapon systems are installed in frontline ships.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Suit II is fought.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Suit II is fought.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Elek Engagement is fought.

gsx$event.$t: The Elek Engagement is fought.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Thranstor is fought, marking the deepest penetration by Klingon forces into Federation space. This intensely-fought battle ends with Federation forces routing the Klingons.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Thranstor is fought, marking the deepest penetration by Klingon forces into Federation space. This intensely-fought battle ends with Federation forces routing the Klingons.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon D-9B research cruiser entered service at this time. It did not see combat during the Four Years War, and its purpose loses importance with the war's end.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet Intelligence later learns that the Klingon D-9B research cruiser entered service at this time. It did not see combat during the Four Years War, and its purpose loses importance with the war's end.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battle of Sire Yopot is fought. Federation forces win a decisive victory in the Engagement for Argelian Approaches.

gsx$event.$t: The Battle of Sire Yopot is fought. Federation forces win a decisive victory in the Engagement for Argelian Approaches.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battles of Sector 12-J, Rex Dacut, and Tirehe, and the Defense of Topax are fought.

gsx$event.$t: The Battles of Sector 12-J, Rex Dacut, and Tirehe, and the Defense of Topax are fought.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Assault of Twam takes place.

gsx$event.$t: The Assault of Twam takes place.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Chariot Class cargo transport becomes operational.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Chariot Class cargo transport becomes operational.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Battles of Sector 23-D, Pens, Oco, and Biwywb are fought.

gsx$event.$t: The Battles of Sector 23-D, Pens, Oco, and Biwywb are fought.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: After extensive research and development, Starfleet's Engineering Command reports the photon torpedo is operational and ready for limited mass production.

gsx$event.$t: After extensive research and development, Starfleet's Engineering Command reports the photon torpedo is operational and ready for limited mass production.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The USS Aramis intercepts a Klingon scout carrying Admiral Komex. Though claiming he is acting for the Klingon Empire's best interests, Komex voluntarily provides Starfleet with information to end the war more quickly.

gsx$event.$t: The USS Aramis intercepts a Klingon scout carrying Admiral Komex. Though claiming he is acting for the Klingon Empire's best interests, Komex voluntarily provides Starfleet with information to end the war more quickly.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Researchers at the Vulcan Science Academy develop a hypospray antidote to the Klingon nerve gas, chlortheragen.

gsx$event.$t: Researchers at the Vulcan Science Academy develop a hypospray antidote to the Klingon nerve gas, chlortheragen.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: A command pod jettisoned by a Klingon D-10A cruiser during the Battle of Kesse is captured intact by the USS Uthe, with some survivors of the battle still aboard.

gsx$event.$t: A command pod jettisoned by a Klingon D-10A cruiser during the Battle of Kesse is captured intact by the USS Uthe, with some survivors of the battle still aboard.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Federation marines assault Karag in the largest operation of its kind during the war. Colonel Anchar Ahab receives the Karagite Order of Heroism.

gsx$event.$t: Federation marines assault Karag in the largest operation of its kind during the war. Colonel Anchar Ahab receives the Karagite Order of Heroism.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet, initially using captured Klingon ships, attacks the Klingon fleet at Grank in the largest fleet action of the war.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet, initially using captured Klingon ships, attacks the Klingon fleet at Grank in the largest fleet action of the war.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The final defense of Kolm-an is fought in the last major operation of the war. The first widespread use of Marine Academy graduates in this battle proves the worth of the new institution. Several senior Klingon officers surrender and are transported as official representatives of their government to Axanar.

gsx$event.$t: The final defense of Kolm-an is fought in the last major operation of the war. The first widespread use of Marine Academy graduates in this battle proves the worth of the new institution. Several senior Klingon officers surrender and are transported as official representatives of their government to Axanar.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Solar Class cutter becomes operational, with almost 1300 built. The first starship class of its size in modern times, it arrives too late to see action, but will serve on post-war picket duty along the new UFP/Klingon border.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Solar Class cutter becomes operational, with almost 1300 built. The first starship class of its size in modern times, it arrives too late to see action, but will serve on post-war picket duty along the new UFP/Klingon border.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Axanar Peace Mission convenes.

gsx$event.$t: The Axanar Peace Mission convenes.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Four Years War ends, as the Treaty of Axanar is signed by dignitaries of the United Federation of Planets and the Klingon Empire. Limited diplomatic channels are established, and concessions are made on both sides as the Axanar Peace Mission negotiates details of the settlement and establishes new boundaries.

gsx$event.$t: The Four Years War ends, as the Treaty of Axanar is signed by dignitaries of the United Federation of Planets and the Klingon Empire. Limited diplomatic channels are established, and concessions are made on both sides as the Axanar Peace Mission negotiates details of the settlement and establishes new boundaries.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The phaser and photon torpedo have finally been manufactured in sufficient quantities to replace the laser and accelerator cannon as the Federation's primary shipboard weapons systems.

gsx$event.$t: The phaser and photon torpedo have finally been manufactured in sufficient quantities to replace the laser and accelerator cannon as the Federation's primary shipboard weapons systems.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Derf Class tender becomes operational, with over 500 constructed. Though not seeing combat, the Derf Class will be responsible for repairing and maintaining navigational beacons along the new border.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Derf Class tender becomes operational, with over 500 constructed. Though not seeing combat, the Derf Class will be responsible for repairing and maintaining navigational beacons along the new border.

content.$t: stardateend: 1/9904.00, full: TRUE, event: Klingon citizens required to relocate in compliance with the terms of the Treaty of Axanar are transported to planets on their side of the newly-redefined Federation/Klingon border.

gsx$event.$t: Klingon citizens required to relocate in compliance with the terms of the Treaty of Axanar are transported to planets on their side of the newly-redefined Federation/Klingon border.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Starfleet's Baton Rouge Class is withdrawn from service, having performed admirably throughout the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet's Baton Rouge Class is withdrawn from service, having performed admirably throughout the Four Years War.

content.$t: stardateend: 1/9905.00, full: TRUE, event: Starfleet, no longer requiring the services of many older starships, decommissions or destroys large quantities of cruisers, destroyers, and scouts. All Constitution, Loknar, Larson, and Nelson Class starships, refitted with phasers and photon torpedoes, continue to serve as the Federation's first line of defense.

gsx$event.$t: Starfleet, no longer requiring the services of many older starships, decommissions or destroys large quantities of cruisers, destroyers, and scouts. All Constitution, Loknar, Larson, and Nelson Class starships, refitted with phasers and photon torpedoes, continue to serve as the Federation's first line of defense.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: General Order Number One is specifically suspended for Axanar, and the planet is established as a UFP protectorate for sociological study. Based on the anticipated success of the Axanar Culture Mission, the government of Axanar has the right to petition for full membership to the Federation in Stardate 2/4903.

gsx$event.$t: General Order Number One is specifically suspended for Axanar, and the planet is established as a UFP protectorate for sociological study. Based on the anticipated success of the Axanar Culture Mission, the government of Axanar has the right to petition for full membership to the Federation in Stardate 2/4903.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Klingon Empire begins construction of a naval installation in its newly-acquired territory. This base, at Mastocal, is completed less than three years later.

gsx$event.$t: The Klingon Empire begins construction of a naval installation in its newly-acquired territory. This base, at Mastocal, is completed less than three years later.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: A full-scale research project under the Office of Starfleet Research and Exploration confirms the underlying accuracy of the transwarp theory, later leading to the transwarp drive. The Zone of Transport Escort is lifted, with all private and commercial starships allowed to return to normal operations.

gsx$event.$t: A full-scale research project under the Office of Starfleet Research and Exploration confirms the underlying accuracy of the transwarp theory, later leading to the transwarp drive. The Zone of Transport Escort is lifted, with all private and commercial starships allowed to return to normal operations.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Star Base 27, constructed near the Klingon border, assumes operational status.

gsx$event.$t: Star Base 27, constructed near the Klingon border, assumes operational status.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Klingon naval base at Mastocal is completed.

gsx$event.$t: The Klingon naval base at Mastocal is completed.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: Kraftzmann Mikil Hartewicce, a research scientist, requests and receives permission to move into the abandoned Arcanis Four Research Outpost to begin his study of the Four Years War.

gsx$event.$t: Kraftzmann Mikil Hartewicce, a research scientist, requests and receives permission to move into the abandoned Arcanis Four Research Outpost to begin his study of the Four Years War.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: After a delay of several decades and as a result of the added danger posed by the new Klingon base at Mastocal, Star Base 12 is finally completed and assumes operational Status.

gsx$event.$t: After a delay of several decades and as a result of the added danger posed by the new Klingon base at Mastocal, Star Base 12 is finally completed and assumes operational Status.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Organian Peace Treaty is imposed by the Organians on both Federation and Klingon forces, thus averting a second war with the Klingons. The Organian Treaty Zone is established by negotiation over the next three months. This new Zone makes important changes in the Klingon/Federation border and results in additional territory for both governments.

gsx$event.$t: The Organian Peace Treaty is imposed by the Organians on both Federation and Klingon forces, thus averting a second war with the Klingons. The Organian Treaty Zone is established by negotiation over the next three months. This new Zone makes important changes in the Klingon/Federation border and results in additional territory for both governments.

content.$t: full: TRUE, event: The Kinza D'elma naval base, built in Klingon territory acquired under the Organian Treaty, is completed.

gsx$event.$t: The Kinza D'elma naval base, built in Klingon territory acquired under the Organian Treaty, is completed.
